flawed_nl_solution:
30 x 2/5 = <<30*2/5=12>>12 members ordered lemon juice.
So, 30 - 12 = <<30-12=23>>23 members did not order lemon juice.
Since 1/3 of the remaining ordered mango juice, then 23 x 1/3 = <<23*1/3=23/3>>23/3 members ordered mango juice.
Therefore, 23 - 23/3 = <<23-23/3=46/3>>46/3 members ordered orange juice.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 18, not 23. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
